item.description:
We're going to try to change up the location more frequently in the future, but I currently have a $30 prize from last year to use up for the group!

Saying you aren't any good at trivia is no excuse not to come to the weekly trivia night at Union Station. Do you watch TV? Movies? Listen to Music? Eat? Know a little history? Geography?

Everyone knows something about the world and can make a great contribution to the game as well as to the conversations around the tables while we play. Come on out, socialize with the easiest group of people you'll ever make friends with!

The game starts between 8:30 and 9 and runs for about 2 hours.

Hope to see you there!

Winnings from the teams will be applied to a future events bill.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the Hostess or a waitress, we may be getting a table away from the front entrance! (I'll also have a sign)
item.name: More Stump! Trivia @ Union Station
